item.title: The Light That Guides You Home
item.description: If you were asked to explain the most implausible fact you know, but which is also true without a doubt, what would it be?

item.title: Ignorance, Trust, and Gratitude - The Inescapable Loop
item.description: Ignorance One of the things that captivates me the most about Astronomy is its unparalleled ability of placing the observer into a position of infinite incomprehension.

item.title: The Hidden Beauty of (Mathematical) Irrationality
item.description: The words which you are reading now have no objective truth behind them.
